src.model.predict

Helper functions for producing model predictions.

src.model.predict.voting_classifier(estimators, X, type)[source]

Generate predictions for a set of fitted estimators.

For soft voting, return the average of the predicted probabilities. For hard voting, return the most common class prediction.

Parameters:

  • estimators (list) – fitted estimators

  • X (pd.DataFrame) – features

  • type (str) – type of prediction. must be ‘soft’ or ‘hard’

Returns:

predictions

Return type:

np.ndarray
